front.title: Resource Management in Diffserv Measurement-based Admission Control PHR

abstract.t: The purpose of this draft is to present the Resource Management inDiffserv (RMD) Measurement-Based Admission Control (RIMA) Per HopReservation (PHR) protocol. The RIMA PHR protocol is used on a per-hop basis in a Differentiated Services (Diffserv) domain and extendsthe Diffserv Per Hop Behavior (PHB) with Measurement-based AdmissionControl features.
